title: Chemtrail Related Illness
cleaned_text:
Sharing the truth is an act of love. Do it today!

By showing those you love the truth, you empower them to protect themselves and their families.

Essentially, narcolepsy is described as extreme daytime sleepiness.

Narcolepsy is caused by a lack of a brain chemical called hypocretin (orexin). This chemical is critical in the process of sleep regulation.

In 2009, it was discovered that the H1N1 vaccine causes a hypocretin deficiency. The injected H1N1 virus contains a protein that causes an autoimmune reaction against hypocretin receptors. These receptors are damaged and/or destroyed by this reaction. When this occurs, hypocretin can no longer be utilized by the body resulting in narcolepsy.

We discovered the connection between a particular chemtrail type and narcolepsy symptoms. The chemtrail type inducing this reaction was the "Pharmaceutical" type.

Mercury, which is in both chemtrails and vaccines, induces autoimmune reactions in the body and may play a role in this autoimmune reaction as well.

We have also tracked the spraying of biologics since 2010 and it is certainly possible that the H1N1 virus has been used in these operations.
